fields.text: You're about to reset the game. Are you sure?

loopRoutine.note: Deal each player a hand of 5 cards

gameStartRoutine.note: Set each player's point total to 0

info.name: Kyoga
info.attribution:
Game layout, library image, and scripting by Robin Harn, released to the Public Domain under CC0.
Desert landscape background is from http://www.freepik.com and used under the Freepik license: https://www.freepik.com/free-vector/desert-landscape-with-sparse-vegetation_412809546.htm

The following graphics are from https://game-icons.net and are used under CC BY 3.0:
* Card Play https://game-icons.net/1x1/quoting/card-play.html
* Card Joker https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/card-joker.html
* Water Recycling https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/water-recycling.html
All animal graphics, and the following graphics, are from Google Noto Color Emoji and are used under the SIL Open Font License: https://fonts.google.com/noto/specimen/Noto+Color+Emoji * Left Arrow https://emojipedia.org/google/16.0/left-arrow * Right Arrow https://emojipedia.org/google/16.0/right-arrow
info.description: Scare other animals away from the watering hole and collect them for points!

fields.text: You're about to reveal scores. Are you sure?
You're about to hide scores. Are you sure?
